phrases: The Master Plan just came in from Army Command.
In the six months following the opening of hostilities, ARUS will focus on defense,
leveraging our national strength and vast territory.
During that time, we will devote all of ARUS' energies into mass-producing this weapon.
They say it defeated an entire Dorssian fleet all by itself.
We can hold out easily enough for six months.
To win, we need to fight.
Once we have confirmation that the JIOR secret weapon has been taken back,
ARUS will enter into an all-out war against Dorssia.
Only through changing its foundation will the world change.
But are not you a Dorssian soldier?!
Factoring in your abilities and the Valvrave, my revolution will come three years earlier.
Be that as it may, your only option is to choose me.
I will add an incentive, of course.
I will save this entire school.
You mean we are sealed in here?!
What was that transmission just now?
Do not tell anyone about me.
This is not a situation where you can stand on principle.
If there is something you want to protect, get your hands dirty, Haruto Tokishima.
I can use that to free the stranded ship
Your only hope for a future is to make a pact with me.
How can I know that unless I try?
Have any of them been wrong?
Even if I have to use that curse to do it!
You will make a pact with me.
When you are ready, give me this sign.
We are not on the same wavelength at all.
He is an ace who shot down seven fighters in the Andaman Campaign.
It is displaying a seriously cute picture.
What kind of program is this?
That is not what happened when I used it...
Enemy defensive forces are a single battalion deployed in a flat plane.
Our victory is not in doubt.
It is not a matter of victory or defeat.
I thought we still had time before the Dorssian fleet got here!
Those tremors were from cannon fire!
We will leave the students behind.
Have a high-speed ship standing by at the auxiliary gate.
We will escape, taking only this robot with us.
You said that we would all escape together!
We did come here to rescue you, that is the truth.
But in order of priority, that came second.
Kindness and volunteer work are just pastimes to spend extra time and money on.
That we are the ones who get to decide whether or not we will help you.
I have to touch the skin?
We are taking him with us as research material.
Are not you ashamed of yourself?!
We have been told that those tremors earlier were from a malfunction in the gravity generator!
I would like to get our escape preparations back underway as soon as repairs are complete.
I have been looking everywhere for you!
Everyone is in the school building.
We are in a lot of trouble.
The 40th Student Council Petitions Committee is now in session.
Why would they need to lie?
The ARUS military encrypts their messages
and then transmits across a wide frequency spectrum using the latest scramble codes.
You could not have heard it.
In that case, I declare this committee meeting closed.
Wait, you have to believe me!
If I am going to put my trust in someone, it is going to be in ARUS.
And yet they had the nerve to take that robot!
As soon as the Module's gravity generator is repaired, we will set out immediately.
Bring us evidence, and we will hear you out.
What does taking off your clothes have to do with that?!
I do not get that girl...
I want them to believe me!
You said All right, did not you?
Yes, so please put your clothes on!
Is she some kind of idiot?
Thank you for all your hard work, ARUS soldiers!
We all wanted to express our gratitude.
Let us go find proof that those guys are liars.
We will sing the school song of JIOR National Sakimori Academy!
Here in the city great and fair
our ideal is to make them come true one day.
Watch over our path, brightly shining Sakimori.
echoes throughout the world, Sakimori Academy.
I love how students are so docile.
We will leave as soon as this song is over.
East and West, past and present,
it calls out to us to return...
You are being moved, Haruto Tokishima.
I am amazed you knew about these tunnels, Otamaya.
Pageant uses the gym's locker room as their dressing room every year.
They have been holding you prisoner this whole time?
You are not here to rescue me?
Everyone, thank you for the wonderful song.
Not at all, we are ashamed that this is the best we could do to thank the people we owe our lives to.
I appreciate it, but we are pressed for time.
No way, we insist that you see it!
Please hold that thought for some other time.
Do not let them fool you!
Everybody, ARUS plans to abandon us and escape by themselves!
They are here to rescue us, are not they?
No way, we even fed them.
That is not true, is it, Senator Figaro?
You are going to rescue us, right?
ARUS always does the right thing, right?
I am about to part this sea of students.
Get inside the school building, everyone!
If you do not move, I will gun you down!
So he is shown his true colors, huh?
It only works if I make direct contact with the skin.
Bit by bit, I am learning.
We cannot take on a whole army.
You said you were going to stay on top until graduation, remember?
It is not like he is your friend...
Hurry up and get us out of here!
Not so funny now, is it?!
Let us hear it for Haruto!
We ended up getting saved by Haruto again, huh?
Unlike you, he will not tell you to pay him for it.
I would never take money from friends.
This means we are safe now, right?
The situation is no different from before.
This Module is already surrounded by Dorssia.
How would a second-year know that?
If the gravity generator malfunction was a lie, what were those tremors afterwards?
If it was a ship running aground, there should have only been one tremor.
You are saying it was an enemy attack?
Except for this Module, all of JIOR has been occupied by Dorssia.
What do you expect us to do about it?!
You are telling me to make that pact with you?
Haruto Tokishima you will choose me.
I am going to end up doing exactly as he says again...
I do not want to die!
Is surrendering all we can do?
We will not let Dorssia lay one finger on our families!
How do you suggest we do that?!
If they threaten us with them
We tell them that if they hurt our families, we will hand this robot over to ARUS!
They will not fall for blackmail like
That robot is the key that will change the outcome of the war...
Use a robot as a hostage?
I never would have thought of that!
We cannot give you the robot.
Nevertheless, keep fighting alongside us, just like before!
As if we would let you manipulate us like that!
In that case, we will just hand this robot over to Dorssia!
I look forward to our two countries continuing as before in their amicable relationship!
It means that neither Dorssia nor ARUS can lay a hand on us.
And ARUS will stay our ally!
Valvrave, why are not you showing yourself?
Do not be in such a rush, Highness.
You saw it on the net, right?
It was not L-elf piloting it.
We have not seen that weapon before!
They are damaging their own Module?
Let us stop depending on others!
Instead of using anything else as a crutch, let us stand on our own two feet!
As of right now, we are independent!
Our school is an independent country, an equal of both Dorssia and ARUS!
You cannot have a country with nothing but children!
Very well, let us now take a vote.
Those in favor of independence, please raise your hands.
Count me in on your crazy idea!
No, we ought to carefully consider this.
Who in the world is that woman?
The daughter of JIOR's prime minister!
I have not laughed in a long, long time.
Next time, episode 5, Singing Sakimori Academy.
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
